posts.post_content: Hi guys I’m moving soon so the wife says I need to “do my part”. Looking to sell my 1907 Dietsche Ty Cobb batting postcard PSA 3. Great looking unmarked card here. Asking $6000 delivered OBO. Also if anyone would like to see it in person I will be at the National (not sure which day yet). Message me with any questions, thanks!
Do you know which day you will be at the National yet?
Hey sorry I was there on Thursday; card has been sold. Thanks for your interest
